## TextElementsRenderer.placeText() method

Places text elements for the current frame.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
placeText(dataSourceTileList: DataSourceTileList[], time: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataSourceTileList | [DataSourceTileList](./harp-mapview.datasourcetilelist.md)<!-- -->\[\] | List of tiles to be rendered for each data source. |
|  time | number | Current frame time. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
